definition: an insignificant student who is ridiculed as being affected or boringly studious, to study intensively, as before an exam
details:
noun
- an insignificant student who is ridiculed as being affected or boringly studious
= example: an insignificant student who is ridiculed as being affected or boringly studious
= synonyms: grind
verb
- to study intensively, as before an exam
= example: to study intensively, as before an exam
= synonyms: drum
